r.d: This extension allows you to use the versatile JSONPath query language to extract the properties that you want from a decoded JSON document.
r.n: * Add support for PHP 8.4 (nightly) and run tests also on PHP 8.4 by @crocodele in https://github.com/supermetrics-public/pecl-jsonpath/pull/176 * Remove some tests specific to PHP 7 by @crocodele in https://github.com/supermetrics-public/pecl-jsonpath/pull/177
